body:
After talking with S&I and going through review in the bug, we decided to cut down this feature to just filtering by number of sync accounts. That patch landed and got uplifted to Beta in [bug 1310146](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1310146).

The remaining work is to add the ability to filter by the new attributes to the self-repair shim and the add-on.
body_text:

The remaining work is to add the ability to filter by the new attributes to the self-repair shim and the add-on.
body_html:
After talking with S&I and going through review in the bug, we decided to cut down this feature to just filtering by number of sync accounts. That patch landed and got uplifted to Beta in bug 1310146.

The remaining work is to add the ability to filter by the new attributes to the self-repair shim and the add-on.
